mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(boardSeq, boardCategory, boardTitle, userSeq, boardContent, boardSubCategory) values ((select nvl(max(boardseq), 0) + 1 from board), #{boardCategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{userSeq}, #{boardContent}, #{boardSubCategory})
mapper.select: select count(*) totalcnt from board where 1=1 and boardcategory = #{boardCategory}
